Sentencas: Barium (Ba)-incorporated strontium and magnesium-doped lanthanum aluminate, La0.9-xSr0.1BaxAl0.9Mg0.1O3-delta (LSBAM, with x = 0.00, 0.01 and 0.03) designated as LSBAM 00, LSBAM 01 and LSBAM 03, respectively, were effectively synthesized via citrate-nitrate-based auto-combustion method taking citric acid (C6H8O7 center dot H2O) as a fuel agent.
Titulo: Influence of Ba Doping on the Electrical Behaviour of La0.9Sr0.1Al0.9Mg0.1O3-δ System for a Solid Electrolyte

Sentencas: The electrical properties of the synthesized compositions were investigated as electrolyte for electrochemical applications.
Titulo: Influence of Ba Doping on the Electrical Behaviour of La0.9Sr0.1Al0.9Mg0.1O3-δ System for a Solid Electrolyte

Sentencas: The powders were also characterized by simultaneous differential thermal analysis and thermogravimetric analysis to confirm the reaction temperature of the final product from the precursor.
Titulo: Influence of Ba Doping on the Electrical Behaviour of La0.9Sr0.1Al0.9Mg0.1O3-δ System for a Solid Electrolyte

Sentencas: The X-ray Rietveld refinement patterns showed the rhombohedral structure with space group R-3c of the investigated systems.
Titulo: Influence of Ba Doping on the Electrical Behaviour of La0.9Sr0.1Al0.9Mg0.1O3-δ System for a Solid Electrolyte

Sentencas: The scanning electron microscope images depicted fairly dense micrographs that are essential for a good electrolyte.
Titulo: Influence of Ba Doping on the Electrical Behaviour of La0.9Sr0.1Al0.9Mg0.1O3-δ System for a Solid Electrolyte

Sentencas: The crystallite sizes were estimated to be in the range of 40 nm to 55 nm.
Titulo: Influence of Ba Doping on the Electrical Behaviour of La0.9Sr0.1Al0.9Mg0.1O3-δ System for a Solid Electrolyte

Sentencas: The effect of doping has been investigated for the further improvement of ionic conducting efficiency of the systems.
Titulo: Influence of Ba Doping on the Electrical Behaviour of La0.9Sr0.1Al0.9Mg0.1O3-δ System for a Solid Electrolyte

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of the La0.9-xSr0.1BaxAl0.9Mg0.1O3-delta system has been measured at different temperatures between 400 degrees C and 700 degrees C to reveal the contribution of grains, grain boundaries and electrode specimen interface response to the total conductivity.
Titulo: Influence of Ba Doping on the Electrical Behaviour of La0.9Sr0.1Al0.9Mg0.1O3-δ System for a Solid Electrolyte

Sentencas: The values of activation energy (E-a) for total conductivity suggest ionic conduction in the system that may primarily be due to the diffusion of O2- ions via oxygen vacancy sites.
Titulo: Influence of Ba Doping on the Electrical Behaviour of La0.9Sr0.1Al0.9Mg0.1O3-δ System for a Solid Electrolyte

Sentencas: The conductivity for all compositions was found to increase with increasing temperature.
Titulo: Influence of Ba Doping on the Electrical Behaviour of La0.9Sr0.1Al0.9Mg0.1O3-δ System for a Solid Electrolyte
